attributes.action: St giblets r c primary school change of uniform
attributes.additional_details: Dear sir or Madam we would like to take this opportunity to oppose the new school uniform,at st Gilbert's primary school,Campbell road Eccles.The new uniform is awful and to expensive,it's £20 for one skirt,but you can buy 3 skirts for half the price in Asda tesco and marks and Spencer's,Also you can get 3 blouses for £6 from the same stores.We did not know of the changes till December last year,the school did not tell us they we're changing the uniform,they told us by getting the children to wear them on the day of the infants Christmas play,I think they have handled it wrongly,also I don't like the idea that the boys can't wear shorts in the summer and the girls can't wear summer dresses.
